query:
WITH new_chat AS (
                    INSERT INTO Chats (type, chat_id, chat_instance)
                    VALUES ($1, $2, $3)
                    ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING
                    RETURNING id
                ) SELECT coalesce(
                    (SELECT id FROM new_chat),
                    (SELECT id FROM Chats WHERE type = $1 AND (chat_id = $2 OR chat_instance = $3))
                ) AS "id!"
